scripts.fix-paths: sed -i '' 's|href="/|href="./|g' dist/index.html && sed -i '' 's|src="/|src="./|g' dist/index.html && sed -i '' 's|"/assets/|"./assets/|g' dist/_expo/static/js/web/index-*.js && mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp "dist/assets/node_modules/@expo/vector-icons/build/vendor/react-native-vector-icons/Fonts/MaterialCommunityIcons.b62641afc9ab487008e996a5c5865e56.ttf" dist/fonts/MaterialCommunityIcons.ttf && sed -i '' 's|MaterialCommunityIcons\.b62641afc9ab487008e996a5c5865e56\.ttf|MaterialCommunityIcons.ttf|g' dist/_expo/static/js/web/index-*.js && sed -i '' 's|"\./assets/node_modules/@expo/vector-icons/build/vendor/react-native-vector-icons/Fonts/MaterialCommunityIcons\.ttf"|"./fonts/MaterialCommunityIcons.ttf"|g' dist/_expo/static/js/web/index-*.js && touch dist/.nojekyll
scripts.predeploy: npm run build:web && npm run fix-paths
